name: A man's home is his castle
name_original: A man's home is his castle
description:
in this game, you play as a lonely person with nothing to do.

you browse the internet, and the webpage you choose to visit could decide your ultimate fate.

you are invited to an obscure party... will you attend???

this game is not explicitly endorsed by babycastles, glorioustrainwrecks.com, or any of their affiliates.
